parameters.name: PlacementPercentage
parameters.description: Position where to insert the midsurface in the body; value of 50 indicates to insert the surface in the middle

parameters.name: Face1List
parameters.description: Array of faces into which the midsurface will be or was inserted; you can provide an array of faces for this parameter and Face2List; if you do not, then the faces are determined internally

parameters.name: Face2List
parameters.description: Array of faces into which the midsurface will be or was inserted; you can provide an array of faces for this parameter and Face1List; if you do not, then the faces are determined internally

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Array containing minimum and maximum thickness of sheet metal for pairs of faces

title: IBody2.GetMiddleSurface
description: Inserts a midsurface in a body.
signature:
System.Int32 GetMiddleSurface( 
   System.Double
PlacementPercentage
,
   out System.Object
Face1List
,
   out System.Object
Face2List
,
   out System.Object
Thickness
,
   out System.Object
MiddleSurfaceBody
)

parameters.name: PlacementPercentage
parameters.description: Position where to insert the midsurface in the body; value of 50 indicates to insert the surface in the middle

parameters.name: Face1List
parameters.description: Array of faces into which the midsurface will be or was inserted; you can provide an array of faces for this parameter and Face2List; if you do not, then the faces are determined internally

parameters.name: Face2List
parameters.description: Array of faces into which the midsurface will be or was inserted; you can provide an array of faces for this parameter and Face1List; if you do not, then the faces are determined internally

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Array containing minimum and maximum thickness of sheet metal for pairs of faces
